meta_description: "Transform your bathroom with this 30in. vanity set featuring a 0.75in. thick vanity top and 1 basin. Includes backsplash, cabinet hardware, and soft close hinges. Made of solid wood and finished back. No electrical outlet. Perfect for transitional themes. Low lead compliant and comes with a 2 year limited warranty. From the Beckett collection, made in Vietnam."
meta_title: "Beckett 30" Vanity Set with Cabinet and Cultured Marble Top - Freestanding Single Basin Design"
details:
Fantastic value and classic design. The elegant Beckett vanity has it all, with quality touches like brushed or matte metal hardware accents, dovetailed drawers, cultured marble counters and soft-close doors. Ample storage gives you plenty of room for those bathroom necessities. Do your bathroom right, with the beautiful Beckett vanity series.

Included Components:

  • Covered under Wyndham Collection's 2 year limited warranty
  • Wood vanity cabinet with 2 doors and 1 shelf
  • Cultured marble vanity top with 1 porcelain sink and matching backsplash
  • Faucet is not included and must be purchased separately

Cabinet Features:

  • Constructed from wood providing a lifetime of durability
  • Free standing installation â€“ vanity is seated on the floor with wall anchors, providing a functional design
  • Double door design provides easy access to storage space
  • Vanity cabinet includes matching decorative hardware
  • Vanity will need to be assembled

Vanity Top Features:

  • Cultured Marble vanity top includes 1 undermount sink
  • Single pre-drilled faucet hole
  • Center drain location provides optimal draining capability
  • Equipped with an overflow drain to help prevent water overflow and spillage from occurring
  • Vanity top includes matching backsplash and sidesplash

Cabinet Specifications:

  • Cabinet Width: 29-1/4" (from left to right)
  • Cabinet Height: 34-1/4" (from top to bottom)
  • Cabinet Depth: 21-1/2" (from front to back)
  • Number of Doors: 2
  • Number of Drawers: 0
  • Number of Shelves: 1

Vanity Top Specifications:

  • Vanity Top Width: 30" (left edge to right edge)
  • Vanity Top Depth: 22" (front edge to back edge)
  • Backsplash Height: 3"
  • Number of Basins: 1
  • Sink Measurements: 19" L x 14" W x 8" H
  • Sink Cutout Width: 10-3/4" (front to back)
  • Sink Cutout Length: 15-1/2" (left to right)
  • Sink Basin Measurements: 15-1/2" L x 10-3/4" W x 6-1/2" H
  • Number of Faucet Holes: 1
